title: The most wonderful and pleasaunt history of Titus and Gisippus whereby is fully declared the figure of perfect frendshyp, drawen into English metre. By Edwarde Lewicke. Anno. 1562.
author: Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Thomas Hacket, and are to be solde at hys shop in Lumbarde streete,
